metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6226 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.1.3, tvOS 12.1.2, watchOS 5.1.3,Safari 12.0.3, iTunes 12.9.3 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.10.Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary codeexecution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
